LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.label: hammer
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.description: A simple, single-handed weapon with a heavy head, designed to deliver powerful blunt force to crush enemies. Using a hammer increases the construction speed slightly.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.label: battle axe
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.description: A hefty, two-handed axe designed for cleaving through foes. Its wide, sharp blade delivers devastating cutting damage, while its mass allows for powerful but slow strikes.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.label: poleaxe
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.description: A versatile polearm featuring a sharp axe head and a back spike, designed for rapid, decisive blows against armored foes. The reach of the poleaxe allows to strike enemies much further away.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.1.label: spike
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.2.label: edge
